mapper.select: SELECT sum(jjsl)as jjsl,tjrq from REC_JQTJB WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by tjrq ORDER BY tjrq asc

SELECT sum(jqtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,xzqhb.xzqhmc as xzqhdm from REC_JQTJB jqtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqhb ON jqtjb.xzqhdm = substr(xzqhb.xzqhdm,1,4) WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} group by xzqhb.xzqhmc ORDER BY jjsl desc
